typhoon use under open source libray:

Catch2 (Catch2 is a multi-paradigm test framework for C++.)
	https://github.com/catchorg/Catch2
	Version: v2.13.6 5c88067bd339465513af4aec606bd2292f1b594a

SFMT (SIMD-oriented Fast Mersenne Twister)
  http://agner.org/random/
  Version: 2014-Jun-14

fmt (a small, safe and fast formatting library)
  https://github.com/fmtlib/fmt
  Version: 8.0.0 9e8b86fd2d9806672cc73133d21780dd182bfd24

utfcpp (UTF8-CPP: UTF-8 with C++ in a Portable Way)
	https://github.com/nemtrif/utfcpp
	Version: v3.2.1 b85efd66a76caccbe0c186b00cab34df1e4281fa

rapidjson (A fast JSON parser/generator for C++ with both SAX/DOM style API http://rapidjson.org/)
  https://github.com/miloyip/rapidjson
  Version: v1.1.0 f54b0e47a08782a6131cc3d60f94d038fa6e0a51

zlib (A Massively Spiffy Yet Delicately Unobtrusive Compression Library)
  http://www.zlib.net/
  Version: 1.2.11

asio (Asio is a cross-platform C++ library for network and low-level I/O programming that provides developers with a consistent asynchronous model using a modern C++ approach.)
	http://think-async.com/Asio/
	Version: 1.18.2

protobuf (Protocol Buffers - Google's data interchange format)
  https://github.com/protocolbuffers/protobuf
  Version: v3.17.3 909a0f36a10075c4b4bc70fdee2c7e32dd612a72

Valgrind (Valgrind is an instrumentation framework for building dynamic analysis tools.)
  https://www.valgrind.org/
  Version: 3.17.0

libreadline (The GNU Readline library provides a set of functions for use by applications that allow users to edit command lines as they are typed in. )
  http://tiswww.case.edu/php/chet/readline/rltop.html
  Version: external
